plays.text: Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Holding the Stick David Tanabe
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Jan Hrdina
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Tripping Kent Manderville
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Interference Aleksey Morozov
Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Alexei Kovalev and Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Ian Moran 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Tripping Niclas Wallin
Goal scored by Kevyn Adams unassisted
Penalty to Ian Moran 2 minutes for Interference Jan Hlavac
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Hooking Jeff O'Neill
Penalty to Jaroslav Svoboda 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jean-Sebastien Aubin
Goal scored by Alexandre Daigle assisted by Mario Lemieux and Dick Tarnstrom
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Interference Rod Brind'Amour
Goal scored by David Tanabe assisted by Rod Brind'Amour and Sami Kapanen
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Hooking Erik Cole
Goal scored by Bates Battaglia assisted by Kevyn Adams and Niclas Wallin
Penalty to Kevyn Adams 2 minutes for Holding Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Slashing Bret Hedican
